name: NSSpecifierTest
desc: A comparison between an object specifier and a test object.

items.name: init(objectSpecifier: NSScriptObjectSpecifier?, comparisonOperator: NSSpecifierTest.TestComparisonOperation, test: Any?)
items.desc: Returns a specifier test initialized to evaluate a test object against an object specified by an object specifier using a given comparison operation.

items.name: enum NSSpecifierTest.TestComparisonOperation
items.desc: These are passed to init(objectSpecifier:comparisonOperator:test:) to specify the comparison operator.
